entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
